tool_description: Get the Best Analysis for Any Stock. Get started for Free!
name: Stock Analysis
title: Stock Analysis

api_list.name: Get EMA
api_list.description:
This endpoint calculates the Exponential Moving Average (EMA) for a specified stock symbol.

EMA is a widely used indicator that helps identify trends and smooth out price fluctuations over a specific period.
It provides insights into the stock's momentum and potential reversal points.

api_list.name: Get Price
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves the current stock price for a specified stock symbol.

It allows users to quickly obtain the latest market value of a particular stock, facilitating real-time decision-making.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-analysis6.p.rapidapi.com/stock/GOOGL/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-analysis6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-analysis6.p.rapidapi.com/stock/{symbol}/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-analysis6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Technical Indicators
api_list.description:
- This endpoint calculates popular technical indicators for a specified stock symbol.

- It provides insights into the stock's performance based on indicators such as Simple Moving Average (SMA), Relative Strength Index (RSI), etc.

- The indicators help identify trends, potential entry or exit points, and make informed trading decisions.
